title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles on Knowledge-enhanced Dialogue Systems (KEDS) up to 2024. This list includes seminal works, recent advancements, and comprehensive surveys to give you a well-rounded understanding of the field
**"Knowledge-Grounded Dialogue Generation with Pre-trained Language Models"**

note: **"A Survey on Knowledge-Enhanced Pre-trained Language Models"** - arXiv 2021

container-title: **"Incorporating External Knowledge to Enhance Commonsense Reasoning in Dialogue Systems"** - AAAI 2021
**"Dynamic Knowledge Graph Enhanced Dialogue Generation"** - ACL 2021

title: **"Knowledge-Aware Dialogue Generation with Pre-trained Language Models"**

container-title: **"A Comprehensive Survey on Dialogue Systems: Recent Advances and New Frontiers"** - ACM Computing Surveys 2021

title: **"Integrating Structured Knowledge and External Information for Dialogue Generation"**
**"Knowledge-Enhanced Neural Conversational Models for Dialogue Systems"**
**"Knowledge-Enhanced Neural Conversational Models for Dialogue Systems"**
**"Knowledge-Driven Conversation Generation with Pre-trained Language Models"**
**"Learning to Generate Knowledge-Grounded Dialogue Responses with Pre-trained Language Models"**
**"Knowledge-Enhanced Dialogue Generation with Pre-trained Language Models"**
**"Knowledge-Enhanced Pre-trained Language Models for Dialogue Generation"** - NeurIPS
**"Incorporating Knowledge into Dialogue Systems: A Survey"**

container-title: **"Knowledge-Enhanced Conversational AI: Techniques and Applications"** - IJCAI 2023

title: These articles cover a range of topics from the integration of external knowledge into dialogue systems, the use of pre-trained language models, and surveys that provide an overview of the field. This list should provide a solid foundation for understanding the current state and future directions of Knowledge-enhanced Dialogue Systems
